27
28#ifndef netdissect_timeval_operations_h
29#define netdissect_timeval_operations_h
30
31/* Operations on timevals. */
32
33#ifndef _MICRO_PER_SEC
34#define _MICRO_PER_SEC 1000000
35#endif
36
37#ifndef _NANO_PER_SEC
38#define _NANO_PER_SEC 1000000000
39#endif
40
41#define netdissect_timevalclear(tvp) ((tvp)->tv_sec = (tvp)->tv_usec = 0)
42
43#define netdissect_timevalisset(tvp) ((tvp)->tv_sec || (tvp)->tv_usec)
44
45#define netdissect_timevalcmp(tvp, uvp, cmp) \
46 (((tvp)->tv_sec == (uvp)->tv_sec) ? \
47 ((tvp)->tv_usec cmp (uvp)->tv_usec) : \
48 ((tvp)->tv_sec cmp (uvp)->tv_sec))
49
50#define netdissect_timevaladd(tvp, uvp, vvp, nano_prec) \
51 do { \
52 (vvp)->tv_sec = (tvp)->tv_sec + (uvp)->tv_sec; \
53 (vvp)->tv_usec = (tvp)->tv_usec + (uvp)->tv_usec; \
54 if (nano_prec) { \
55 if ((vvp)->tv_usec >= _NANO_PER_SEC) { \
56 (vvp)->tv_sec++; \
57 (vvp)->tv_usec -= _NANO_PER_SEC; \
58 } \
59 } else { \
60 if ((vvp)->tv_usec >= _MICRO_PER_SEC) { \
61 (vvp)->tv_sec++; \
62 (vvp)->tv_usec -= _MICRO_PER_SEC; \
63 } \
64 } \
65 } while (0)
66
67#define netdissect_timevalsub(tvp, uvp, vvp, nano_prec) \
68 do { \
69 (vvp)->tv_sec = (tvp)->tv_sec - (uvp)->tv_sec; \
70 (vvp)->tv_usec = (tvp)->tv_usec - (uvp)->tv_usec; \
71 if ((vvp)->tv_usec < 0) { \
72 (vvp)->tv_sec--; \
73 (vvp)->tv_usec += (nano_prec ? _NANO_PER_SEC : \
74 _MICRO_PER_SEC); \
75 } \
76 } while (0)
77
78#endif /* netdissect_timeval_operations_h */
79
